welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Camas, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and hope you enjoy your stay with us."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves as the hub for Alaska Airlines and their partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves as the hub for American Airlines and their partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves as the hub for Delta Airlines and their partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Portland International Airport serves as the hub for Southwest Airlines and their partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Portland International Airport serves as the hub for United Airlines and their partner airlines.

wifi.note: The airport offers free WiFi throughout all terminals and concourses.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cascade Locks/Stevens Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cascade Locks/Stevens Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 primarily serves regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.
